title: On my home screen, the Google task bar will not work. As soon as I type 1 letter, it disappears.
content: I have restarted the phone several times and have left it off for hours. I also have 1 game on my phone, and it will not load now. In the settings it has a google option to click on, it won't work as well.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
